Reviews.Title: One of my core accessories
Reviews.Author: Aubrey Falconer
Reviews.Content: This case is great! As with all Pelican products, build quality is excellent. I designed a custom retention system which consists of a length of tensioned webbing running along the back and 2 metal clips to securely and effortlessly strap it to my belt, and a "mini wallet" compartment - which is a folded piece of cardboard tucked in the front between the two foam spacers. I used the cardboard from my iPhone packaging, and centered the package's super cool metallic Apple logo in the viewing area over it's sleek black background.This case could be better if it had the mini wallet built in so I didn't have to add it, but I am perfectly satisfied with my solution. The headphone storage could also have used much more thought - if you just stuff your headphones in the bottom of the storage area, they will cause you grief by making it difficult to rapidly remove and insert the iPhone without getting attacked by them. I am working on a special "cage" to coil the headphones around before inserting them into the case.My final complaint with this case is the most serious, and it's a major flaw with the current design. The audio throughput cable has only three wires - not four - so it is impossible to use your iPhone headphone's microphone or music control button when the iPhone is in the case. There is absolutely no excuse for this, and I was very disappointed to find it out. I can't wait for Pelican to release an updated case - or even to just mail me a new cable that I could install once they get this figured out.Update - 2010-09-09:Pelican has upgraded this product, and the version they are now selling includes a TRRS cable which will allow you to use a headset and control your music while your phone is in the case.Pelican mailed me a new TRRS cable free of charge, and it works great!Also, this case will PERFECTLY fit an iPhone 4 with Apple's bumper installed if you take a sharp pair of scissors and trim down the ribs which support the back of the protrusions on the rubber liner against the clear outer shell.Here's some pics of my modded case:[...]

Reviews.Title: Great for outdoor sports.
Reviews.Author: TheTodd1981 "TheTodd"
Reviews.Content: Not a case for everyday use, it's far too large to carry comfortably in most situations.  However, there are situations when this case works out very well.  I spend a lot of time kayaking, and this case is perfect for being out on the water, when used with some water resistant headphones.  I wouldn't go swimming with it, but it's survived all of the splashes and minor soakings it's received while out on the kayak.  The clip is pretty convenient, I just clip it to my vest or shorts, and no worries whenever a swell gives a bit of a splash.I use the case with a 2nd Gen iPod Touch, which fits easily and securely into the case.  Because of the foam inserts in the front of the case, it will also fit other similar-sized electronics, even if they're a bit thicker.  I have a G1 phone, and it fits right in as well.  As with all Pelican cases, it's very sturdy, and I have no doubts I could throw my iPod at a wall, drop it on the ground, sit on it, maybe even stand on it with no damage.Only problem is that you cannot operate the iPod whenever the case is closed.  If you have a good music list, it's not really a problem, and as long as you're relatively dry, it only takes a moment to open the front and do what you need to.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Insurance
Reviews.Author: Mark Fleser
Reviews.Content: This is going to be cheap insurance for my iPhone 4 when I'm doing things outdoors.  It fits my iPhone 4 while it's still in it's case-mate Barely There case with some room to spare.  I saw a Youtube video that said that the remote on the earbuds did not work, he might have been using and older version of the case, or he just didn't know what he was talking about, because the one I received has the standard 3 ring headphone plug that supports the mic and playback controls!  The picture and description is a little deceiving because it says "black" as the color, the gasket that seals the case and holds the device is black, the case itself is all clear, not a big deal though.  So far it looks like this is going to be a good case and heavy duty protection.

Reviews.Title: THIS CASE IS THE REAL DEAL!!
Reviews.Author: hugh d scott
Reviews.Content: I'm surprised to see so many less than outstanding reviews for this case.  I don't know if Amazon has corrected the "wrong description" problem that everyone else seems to be upset about, but I received the case as listed with a clear lid (ordered July 2010).This case is the REAL DEAL!  I work in construction, so I'm constantly worried about my ipod being crushed in my pocket, or spilling coffee on myself or getting wet working in the rain or (most of all) getting my device DUSTY.  For me the dustproof and crushproof features are the payoff.  I never put myself in a situation where I might drop my $300 ipod into water so I'm not concerned with the difference between "watertight" and "splashproof" as another reviewer is.  It is NOT idiot-proof.I saw a remark in another review about the headphone jack being incompatible with the ipod headphone/microphone.  Again, the case I received has the three wire jack and works fine with the voice control and other microphone related features.A word about bulk: this unit is a bit bulky compared to most ipod cases.  But the extra bulk is equal to the extra protection.  I still keep mine in my pocket while I work and even in tight fitting work pants it fits fine and is not uncomfortable ( I don't sit down at work)All the obvious cons other reviewers have listed are obvious.  No, you can't touch your "ipod touch"  through the lid.  It is easy, however, to operate the touch screen while the ipod is still in the case with the lid open.  The rubber tabs that hold it in place do so fairly well with the lid open.Wi-fi works fine with the ipod in the case.  If you have a very weak connection you might improve it slightly by removing it.In my opinion, and for the way I use my device this case is worth the money twice over.  I was thrilled that it was less than thirty bucks and even more so when all of the things I was worried about from other reviews turned out to be (for me) not true.

Reviews.Title: Pelican case vs. the H20 Audio Armband case
Reviews.Author: John Rawlins
Reviews.Content: Hi,In my quest for something to protect my iPhone from water and sand I've tried a few different products.  The two most robust are this Pelican case and the Armband case from H20 Audio.  The H20 armband is also currently available from Amazon and might be something to consider depending on how you intend to use them.Although both products are designed to keep your iPhone dry they differ considerably in construction.  Each has its merits and I'll run through a few of them.- Both provide good protection from water.  They seal well and the latches are secure.- The Pelican is far more crush proof.  If you plan on throwing your phone in a dry bag with all your gear and taking it on a rafting or kayaking trip it's a solid choice.- The H20 Armband is constructed primarily of wetsuit material.  It offers a measure of padding particularly on the sides and back.  However, the front of the phone is covered by a thin sheet of transparent vinyl.  Gear rubbing against it could easily damage or tear the vinyl and damage the iPhone.- The best thing about the H20 armband is you can operate the touch screen while it's in the case.  Voice control will only get you so far.  If you want to read your email or check sports scores you need more than voice control.- The Pelican has a little bit of room for additional storage.  Though there isn't a great deal of space it's enough to fit in your ear-buds, a key or two, and some cash.  The armband has very little extra space.- The H20 Armband is a very tight squeeze for the iPhone.  I always worry about getting the phone in and out of the case without harming it.- The Pelican case is considerably less expensive.  You can get two or three or them for what the armband costs.It really comes down to your intended applications.  Ignoring the price difference if you want something primarily for listening to music and providing excellent storage the Pelican is great.  However, if you want a case that will allow you to use all the features of your phone during your activities the H20 Armband is the winner in my opinion.Best regards,John

Reviews.Title: What's better for your iPod - Pelican i1010 or Otter Box?
Reviews.Author: LEE
Reviews.Content: In a side-by-side comparison, the Otter Box appears to be a better waterproof or water-resistant case for an iPod.The Otter Box is much thinner than the Pelican i1010 and the iPod's scroll wheel can be used when the Otter Box case is closed.  There is, however, a serious drawback to the Otter Box in that it's designed for a specific model.  For example, I have a Otter Box for a 20GB iPod.  When I upgraded to a 80GB iPod Classic, it would not fit my Otter Box so it became a useless dinosaur.Unlike the Otter Box, the Pelican i1010 fits my 80GB iPod Classic so it also fits most other iPods including the Shuttle and Nano (NOT the iTouch, there's a different Pelican for the iTouch).  This means if I switch between different models of iPods, I can still use the same Pelican i1010.  It won't become a dinosaur like my Otter Box.  If for some reason I find myself no longer using an iPod, I can pull out the liner and use the Pelican i1010 as a small general-purpose waterproof box.I've been using the Pelican i1010 to protect my iPod when I sea kayak and it works flawlessly.  I thought about buying a cheaper waterproof "dry bag" for iPods, but it didn't offer the same rugged construction of a Pelican to protect my iPod.In an overview of all pros and cons, the Pelican i1010 wins compared to the Otter Box.

Reviews.Title: Nice case, but also received the black one.
Reviews.Author: J.J. "J.J."
Reviews.Content: Just to reaffirm what the other reviewers stated, I received a totally black case.Even the lid is black, so basically I'm just putting my iPod in a box. Even though the touch screen would be unusable even with a clear lid, you would at least be able to watch a movie, or see what song is playing, etc. Besides that, the case itself is very rugged and does as advertised.Pros: Rugged, headphone jack is nice, clip is a handy featureCons: No access to touchscreen, black lid makes it unusable to view movies, and no access to charge or dock iPod.All in all I will be returning the case due to the black lid. I figured, when ordering, that the touchscreen would be unaccessable and there would be no option to charge the iPod in the case, but the black lid basically makes this an iPod shuffle.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic, just a bit needlessly large
Reviews.Author: Andrew "Andrew the Cook"
Reviews.Content: I've learned that my iPhone is a great replacement for a GPS when I mountain bike.  And last weekend, I also learned that when I go over the handlebars and land on my iPhone in my backpack, its screen shatters into a million glittery pieces.So, not wanting to give up on the great GPS functions (not to mention the ability to call someone should I have an emergency within cell phone range) of my iPhone, but not wanting the shattering to occur again, I began to search for a suitable case.While the OtterBox Defender Case iPhone 4 (Blue/Black, Fits AT&T; iPhone 4) is generally lauded at doing a good job of protecting your phone from drops and dings, I'm certain it wouldn't do anything if your screen got smashed between - let's say - your falling body and a rock.  Also, since I'm just looking for a case to use while I'm riding, the Defender seems to require quite a bit of effort to put on and take off.After some looking around, I realized that the only crush-proof cases would be one that didn't allow me to use my phone's touchscreen while it was inside.  I don't ever listen to music while I'm biking, so headphone access wasn't important to me.  Those requirements narrowed me down to Pelican and Otterbox's waterproof cases.In terms of appearance, I actually prefer the Otterbox cases, but the OtterBox 1000 Series Waterproof Case is too small to hold an iPhone, and the next size up, the OtterBox Waterproof Universal Case (Black) has an interior dimension of 5.757" x 3.140", which would leave your iPhone rattling around without some extra padding, and I'd prefer to not be carrying around too much extra bulk in any case.So, that left me with either this case, or the Pelican Micro Protective Case (Black) - which is the i1015 case without the headphone port and interior headphone storage winder thing.  Even though I don't generally listen to music while I ride, I  figured it might be nice to have the option, so I went with the i1015.So far, I'm quite happy with that decision.  My phone fits nicely in the case.  There's plenty of room to fit headphones or other accessories in there, but everything is snug and feels well protected.  I'm certain my phone in this case would survive the type of crash I had last weekend, and should I move from Southern California to someplace that occasionally rains, it'd be nice to know that my phone would survive a deluge.My only complaint, and reason for a 4* review instead of a 5*, is that the case has some needless bulk.  It's clear when you handle the case that removing the (useless to me) headphone storage area would let it reduce its depth by close to 50%, and it feels like the height and perhaps width could be reduced by another 20% or so without negatively impacting its protective capabilities.If Pelican or Otterbox builds a waterproof case with a reduced profile, to fit the iPhone 4 exactly, I'll be the first in line to buy it.  Until then, the i1015 is the best option out there for people like me who like to bring their phones along in the outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy!
Reviews.Author: MABruss "MABruss"
Reviews.Content: Now I have absolutely no worries about my new iPod touch getting ruined! Tested the case and it can withstand over 48 lbs. of water pressure (meaning could possibly go 50 ft. under water).

Reviews.Title: For those who wonder what this is for..
Reviews.Author: Jill Lassaline "Jill Lassaline - parentsworld...
Reviews.Content: I had a 1st generation iPod touch and loved it so very much.  Late one night I was enjoying a long hot bath with the iPod as usual. I would sit it on a facecloth on the side of the tub and enjoy an audio book.  This time, however, I managed to fall asleep...and roll over... and awake to the spash of the ipod hitting the water.  It was never saved and had to be replaced (darn, those things are not cheap!)A friend told me about this case and I got it right away for my new iPod touch.  Now, any time I feel it could be "at risk" it goes in this case.  It sure doesn't go near a tub without it anymore!  I used it when I was travelling too - very handy and you know it's safe and not squished up against something.If you use your iPod touch/iPhone anywhere except safely at your desk, I'd highly recommend getting this.

Reviews.Title: fits iphone 5
Reviews.Author: B. Gobble
Reviews.Content: didn't see this anywhere else, but the iphone 5 works perfectly in this. Wish it had a little more length so I could wire power to the phone while on the road (I have this mounted to my motorcycle)

Reviews.Title: Real, solid, quality.
Reviews.Author: J.B.
Reviews.Content: I've always been thoroughly impressed with Pelican products and this one is no different. I use a couple of different Pelican cases for my photography gear and they've taken every type of abuse I've put them through.This iPhone case is made to a similarly high quality standard, with thick plastic, secure closure design, excellent seal design, and the ability to use both straps and the included metal clip. Foam pads and rubber backing keeps the iPhone from the worst of the shock and vibration.The only thing I wish for is a way to control the iPhone while it's in the case, but that's being picky... If you need a way to transport your iPhone without fear of it getting wet or crushed, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Not even close.
Reviews.Author: William Farris "spacemtn"
Reviews.Content: I have bought two of these holders because it is supposed to be water resistant, but they both leaked and the inside had condensation build up. If you can't take it to the beach then what good is it.

Reviews.Title: Not Suitable For iPhone5
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: Good Quality case. iPhone 5 will squeeze in but you can not use headphone jack. To tight. Will have to give to iPhone 4 user..

Reviews.Title: Great for its intended purpose
Reviews.Author: nate
Reviews.Content: This case has a fairly narrow intended use, and won't suit you if you're looking for everyday protection, or a case for running, biking, etc.But if you're simply using it to protect your device from harsh environments, I haven't seen anything more durable. Not being able to control the screen or buttons is the price you pay for such protection.I compile a music playlist (or put on Pandora), press play, set the volume, put my iPhone in the case, plug in my Sennheisers, clip the case to a tether, and toss it on the floor of my kayak... then splash it, submerge it, and generally beat it up for a few hours. If this is the sort of protection you need, the build quality and functionality of this case make it the best choice.

Reviews.Title: iPod Touch case is an purchase
Reviews.Author: Andy Greene
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent device: it makes it much more difficult for my lovely wife to damage her iPod Touch due to dropping it (again, once down the stairs), forgetting it on the top of the car and driving away, and dropping it into the pool.She doesn't even need to open it to play it through the car speakers (using the aux in).Would definitely recommend, and would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Hubby adores it
Reviews.Author: Radar626
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband as his job sometimes is a hazard to his phone.  This case will hopefully negate those issues.  The phone fits quite snugly (it's already in an Insipio casing), so there's no worry about it rattling around inside the case. It's still possible to hear the phone ringing, but it's quite muted even on full volume. If the phone is on vibrate you will not notice calls/texts/alerts at all.  Headphones (the ear bud kind) store well inside the case, and the headphone jack makes them easy to use.  The little storage pocket also works well for holding cash or ID. The case is rather bulky and won't fit into a typical pant front or back pocket, and it can be a snug fit inside a leg cargo pocket.  The carabiner clips allow attachment to a belt, but that too can be awkward.  The screen is easily visible through the cover, and of course you can't get to any of the phone functions without first opening the case.  This case makes great protection (and added piece of mind) if your phone is going to be exposed to any less than friendly conditions.

Reviews.Title: Bulky but good
Reviews.Author: No Pen name
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these for cycling.  I cycle about 2.5-3 hours a day often in the rain up here in the Northwest.  While the case is a bit bulky for fitting in a pocket it works well.  It keeps out both the rain and condensation.  Good choice for those spending lots of time outside in rainy weather.

Reviews.Title: Wrong description from AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Zachary Mackay
Reviews.Content: The Amazon description for this item is wrong and right on Pelican's website it states: GREAT FOR RUGGED SPORTS - NOT FOR SWIMMING OR SUBMERGING, water resistant! No where on the Pelican site does it describe this item as being water tight and this is an Amazon issue.There are two models of the i1015 and the description for this one clearly states (BLACK), the one with the clear lid is : http://www.amazon.com/Pelican-i1015-Black-iPhone-Resistant/dp/B002PJWHMS/ref=pd_cp_e_0.Amazon, please update your products to match the manufacturers descriptions and include proper images. (here is the black image, [...])As far as the product itself, it does exactly what is described and I am giving the product itself 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipod Case
Reviews.Author: Jorge A. Acosta
Reviews.Content: A bit bulky but definitely waterproof.  Great for taking a trip on a kayak or canoe.

Reviews.Title: Great Case
Reviews.Author: Bryant K.
Reviews.Content: This case is perfect for my phone. It provides great protection for when my work takes me out into the field. It's also a nice case to have when I take my phone to the beach or go hiking.

Reviews.Title: I use this for my MOTOROLA DROID and it fits perfect.
Reviews.Author: Gift Card "Sheila"
Reviews.Content: This case is wonderful for my droid phone. crush proof water resistant etc. Finally a case that can keep up with my active lifestyle

Reviews.Title: Nice box.
Reviews.Author: John H. Pettas
Reviews.Content: The box works great even though it was too small for the Ipod classic. I did send it back and Pelican replaced it with the next size up.

Reviews.Title: When only the best will do
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Nobles
Reviews.Content: This is the product to buy when you absolutely, positively want to protect your ipod. I have one that has been in a pack throughout 3 years of heavy use plus airline and Amtrak travel and in numerous rafts on whitewater float trips and it works perfectly. Pelican cases are not the cheapest on the market...just the best. These cases will do what they say they will do and there is an iron-clad guarantee.

Reviews.Title: Great protection
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This item is great protection for my Ipod. Being in the military I am familiar with Pelican cases and their protection is unmatched. There are some things that could be improved upon however. First, from the description of the product I thought the front would be clear so I could see my Ipod, but that is not a big deal. Second, when I plug my earphones into the jack that runs through the case, the volume/pause feature on the earphones no longer works. Last, the case is a lot more thick than it needs to be. There is a large open space inside the case that could be cut down by 20% and still provide protection. Overall I am happy with this product, it does what I need it to do, but there are definitely some improvements that could be made for convenience.

Reviews.Title: Not for the iPhone 5s
Reviews.Author: Big G
Reviews.Content: Great quality build but won't fit the iPhone 5 s. other than that, I am surfeit is an excellent case

Reviews.Title: Very solid case
Reviews.Author: Dan Langille
Reviews.Content: I use this case when mountain biking.  It protected my iPhone 4 from crashes and water.  My iPhone 5 also fits it, albeit a bit tighter than the 4.

Reviews.Title: phone gets too hot
Reviews.Author: Timi Lesperance
Reviews.Content: I love that no water ever gets into this box, so its great for kayaking, boating, etc. However, I was disappointed in how hot the case gets inside when you are in the sun. I have to keep it in a cooler when floating down the river on a sunny day, because the phone gets so hot in the case that it won't function.

Reviews.Title: case
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: Works perfect. A great way to take care if your.investments. It cost less yhan replacing your ohine or ipod, anf way way less than buying in a store!!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5 does not fit with the earphones cable in
Reviews.Author: Carlos Losada
Reviews.Content: Only for iPhone 4 or 4s. It is too small for iPhone five. It is resistant and closes very well.

Reviews.Title: Mad
Reviews.Author: gladys howse
Reviews.Content: This Product was stated to be a clear case,the case is all black,its already large and bulky which I did'nt mind but I cannot see when I recieve a call,if I dont  have the earphones on ,the money was put back on my account,then suddenly taken back,

Reviews.Title: pelican iphone case
Reviews.Author: lhblues2001
Reviews.Content: I've had this case about a week now and I can't find anything bad to say about it. I bought it because I'm an avid fly fisherman and I like to listen to music while I do it.  but taking an iphone or an ipod out into the middle of the river is asking for trouble.  I bought this thinking that if I fall, I'll at least save my phone if not my dignity.  I submerged it in my sink with a peice of paper in it for two minutes, paper stayed dry.  My headphones still retain all of their functionality (i.e. volume change, answer the phone, skip song, etc.) and I'm no longer worried about destroying my phone when I fall into the river.  Another plus, I bought from a third party seller, not amazon, so my case didn't come with a liner which I was initially dissapointed about, but it seems that without a liner my iphone fits perfectly while in its otterbox deffender case.  All in all, the pelican case is perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Vito A. Palazzo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product based in its name.  I have an ipod touch and a Droid phone. Pelican products rule. There is non better. Strong. Secure. Waterproof .

Reviews.Title: Great for Boaters!
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a Kayak and waned to be able to take my Ipod out with me without worrying damaging it.  I found this case to be the best choice with the added headphone jack that allows the ipod to be completely dry and still listen to music at the same time.  This was a great design feature by Pelican.  Also the carabiner is another great feature in case I were to tip over it is secured to the Kayak so it will not sink to the bottm.  It is a basic product not many technical  features but I could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: 100% protection Pelican  i1015
Reviews.Author: fly in fly out
Reviews.Content: This case gets used when i work away on mine sites in western australia. I keep the phone in the Pelican i1015 while i work, and know that nothing will come close to even scratching it. I have a touchscreen android motorola defy that fits inside the box perfectly and am confident that I wont ever have to worry about replacing a broken screen. It fits a variety of phones, including nokias, iphones and htc.The i1015 is so strong and well made that I could probably kick the bloody thing in my steelcaps without having to worry about the phone inside being damaged .The phone is most at danger when I take it out to make or receive a call. Every other minute of the day its locked inside its own personal suit of armour and is going to stay protected.Pelican i1015 Black Case With Clear Lid For iPhone Water ResistantI recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: It will protect your ipod
Reviews.Author: Chancho Salvaje "Chancho Salvaje"
Reviews.Content: This box is great. You won't have to worry about smashing your ipod while you throw your back pack. The only thing is get the Luv remote control cause otherwise you'll be opening and closing the box all the time just to adjust the volume or stuff like that.Lot's of room inside for headphones, cleaning cloth and remotebye

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Michael Khoury
Reviews.Content: as noted by another , Pelican sent us the upgrade connection and this is the best product money can buy!!!!

Reviews.Title: Must Have
Reviews.Author: J. Warner
Reviews.Content: I listen to my Ipod Touch in the Hot Tub and this is a must have if you are around water.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: K. Kopp
Reviews.Content: I love this case!  It's bulky, but perfect for being outdoors.  I plan to use it at the lake all summer and for 2 trips that are planned to Hawaii...I know it will work perfectly for what I need!

Reviews.Title: Not just for iPhones anymore
Reviews.Author: Not For Sale
Reviews.Content: It seems like even though the iPhone is losing market share to phones such as the Samsung Galaxy and Moto X, everybody still makes all the cool accessories for the iPhone to the exclusion of other makes/models.  I got this case to protect my Moto X while I'm out camping or hiking.  I took careful measurements of my phone's dimensions and checked them against the internal dimensions posted on Pelican's website.  With some slight modifications to the rubber insert, my Moto x fits securely inside the case.  The rubber insert isn't solid, but rather about 1/16" thick.  With a sharp X-Acto knife I was able to carefully cut away some material from the wings that hold the phone so that my Moto fits snugly, but not tight.  The only complaint I have is that I can't use the integrated weatherproof jack, but that's more of a function of my phone's size and jack location than a problem with the case.  It was, after all, designed with Apple products in mind.  Otherwise it keeps my phone safe and secure from the elements, shock, and the occasional dunking if I'm crossing (read that: falling into) a stream.

Reviews.Title: Great for people who are active or rough on things.
Reviews.Author: Breezey
Reviews.Content: I have had two of these. They  are great for around a garage or shop or in an vehicle like a boat or open jeep. Really good protection, but bulky. Not something I would run with.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend for great protection.
Reviews.Author: A. Stewart
Reviews.Content: Couple this case with a icord that will control your iphone/ipad and you have a perfect, sealed case that protects against water and dust, sand etc. Perfect for the beach or anything outdoor. A little bulky but that just translates into protection. I even clip this to my belt loop and wear it mowing the yard. Great price for the protection it provides.

Reviews.Title: Pelican!! Nothing more needs said!`
Reviews.Author: Bob Santee
Reviews.Content: Another high quality Pelican product!! Bought this for use in my dry bag. I crab out on the Pacific ocean and needed a device to store my phone out of the elements. This is it!! I did get a clear face box. No can't use phone once in the box,didn't expect that.Wanted protection from crushing and water damage,,,,This is it!!

Reviews.Title: protection for my child's phone
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Finally relented on letting my daughter have an IPhone and was really worried it would get damaged while in her backpack at school.Although the iPhone 5C doesn't fit the i1015 as recieved, my husband was able to modify the liner easily so it would fit snuggly.The case is so sturdy there is no way the phone can get damaged if her backpack gets thrown around or is stood on.

Reviews.Title: Big mistake
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Maybe I'm doing something wrong but this product doesn't work for me.  I can't get the cord functions to work when everything is in place.  Maybe it's the little extra cord preventing the commands to send. All I know is it was a waste of my money and I really wanted to use it kayaking.

Reviews.Title: looks good but not built for Iphone 5
Reviews.Author: WILFRED A "opencanoepaddler"
Reviews.Content: The Iphone 5 will fit snugly, but not with the earphone jack in or with any case on the phone. I wish they would make it just a little bit longer!

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I purchased this case for my IPOD Classic 160gb. It fits snuggly and the external head phone jack is perfect for listening to my music while dealing with the elements. The case is solid black, which is what I ordered and it locks really well. The inside has a nice rubber cushion to keep the IPOD in place as well as enough room to wrap the unused head phones inside the keep everything nestled together. The case would have a been a little better if it was a few millimeters large width wise, but it works and it works well. the carabineer allows me to hang it on my purse. It is bulky, but if you want to protect an expensive item, you must sacrifice. I would recommend this for anyone who is clumsy or who is rough on stuff. The case is water tight but I do not recommend you tossing it into a vat of water to see what happens with your product inside…

Reviews.Title: What the....
Reviews.Author: S. Haley
Reviews.Content: Condensation always forms inside this case, I bought it for my old iPhone 4 to use while I store it in my backpack skiing and while the size and fit is perfect I've found a ziploc bag works better.

Reviews.Title: The BEST iPod case ever!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: lican cases are impossible to beat! If you are hard on your iPod's, or spend time at the beach, the out doors or, Heaven help you and you have children, then this model is for you! Plenty of room inside to put both iPod connector cable and earphones.It is not a namby-pamby little wannabee case...it is a TOUGH case!A new iPod costs a lot of money...this doesn't!

Reviews.Title: Protective, big
Reviews.Author: John L. Bjerga
Reviews.Content: This is only to keep you phone protected and dry. Once it's in the case, you cannot access any phone functions. If you are looking for a rugged case and are ok with having to open it to use the phone, this case is ok. I do like the belt clip and use this case when I'm working outside and need my phone with me. Offers great protection because it's big, bulky and durable.  If you realize it's limitations, this is a good case.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: Love this product!  Was packaged well and just as promised, super impressed with it.  Took literally less than 2 minutes to open the package, unwrap it, insert my iPod, plug it in and play it.  Excellent sound quality, well protected.  We are using it in our RZR and it is PERFECT!  Very decent price for such an awesome product!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: fahad
Reviews.Content: i love it and help me . thanks sealer you have a good stuf so good and good quility. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great case
Reviews.Author: Timothy Berkey
Reviews.Content: Greay case, a little bulky but that's the price that you pay for the protection that it provides! Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Typical Pelican!
Reviews.Author: Bingo Fuel
Reviews.Content: I popped my iPhone 4s in this unit and hit the water slides at Seasame Place Waterpark this past weekend. A few times it slipped out of my pocket and floated away. Not once did it sink or get any water into the case. I put my credit cards and IDs in there too. The case is designed so well that IF a small amount of water got into it, it wouldnt touch the phone. There is a riser system that keeps the phone elevated off the bottom. The case also self rights itself when floating. Its really an impressive little case. I have several other pelican cases so this was a no-brainer. They've yet to let me down! Now if only they'd make waterproof speakers!

Reviews.Title: Its pelican....
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Ummmmm, Maybe a toss up on this one.You can not charge and use this at the same time.... kind of bummed about that as it was why I bought it. to mount on my bike...

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Bahe
Reviews.Content: only complaint is it does not come with a belt clip.  otherwise a great case. it came exactly as described.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: gloworm
Reviews.Content: I was hoping my iPhone with its soft case would fit in this, but it doesn't.  Not the fault of the item, though.  I bought this to use for hiking and camping exclusively, and as such, I have not evaluated it yet.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: chris bitner
Reviews.Content: Mounted this on my ATV to use my phone for music with my audio tube. Worked great. Keeps the phone clean and dry even while mudding and ridding in the rain.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I bought this to be able to take my iPhone mud riding. I love it & it fits perfectly. No mud or water in the box & we went underwater. It's dust proof also.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant Design
Reviews.Author: Zephyrmusic
Reviews.Content: I looked all over the place for something that would protect my kids' iPods, and this is the only thing I found that made sense.  My daughter already had one iPod destroyed because someone stepped on her backpack, so now she has this.  Ear buds coil up in the bottom, and the whole thing seals up perfectly.In theory, you can plug your headphones right into a jack on the side of the case and listen to your iPod while the case is closed.  The one I received doesn't work with the Apple ear buds that have the volume control on them.  Since my daughter didn't care, I didn't pursue it, but I understand the company does have a solution for this.

Reviews.Title: Extremely strong
Reviews.Author: Laura Donohue
Reviews.Content: I bought this box to protect my phone while skiing. I once had some yahoo crash into me while skiing and he broke the screen on my camera so I am very careful about my phone screen. It's a little too bulky to keep in a pocket so I decided not to use it to ski with. I kept it anyway to use at the beach and while boating because it is such a great protective and waterproof box.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!!
Reviews.Author: Murphy
Reviews.Content: A buddy of mine got one of these and raved about it (his was green). I found a blue one and ordered it. I have dropped my iPod. Had it in the rain. Dropped it in a puddle. I think an elephant sitting on an Hummer, loaded with full with concrete blocks, sitting on top of a semi truck which is still on a freight train, could probably run over this thing and knock it into the ocean and after fishing it out.... my iPod would would still work (ok,that might be a tad dramatic and I am not willing to actually try THAT) but I have no doubt it will take anything my average mundane life could throw at it.I like to take care of my stuff and for a reasonable price....this lets me do exactly that (plus...the color blue is just a super cool color)

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Fred IV
Reviews.Content: It works just as described.  Great protection from the elements.  I use it on my Yamaha Grizzly and it works great.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: GIfts
Reviews.Author: Joe Ferraro "JF"
Reviews.Content: I gave these as gifts to some family members who kayak.  So far so good.  They like the clip which they can just clip to the kayak and the headphone feature.  A+

Reviews.Title: Perfect match
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: I searched everywhere in town for one of these and no one had them in stock.  It was a requested Christmas gift. I found it on amazon.com, ordered it and it arrived the exact day that was stated. Great job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: atv
Reviews.Content: Would recommend fits my iPod classic perfect is a little bulky like everyone else said but good.  Have not tested the water resistance part but will do for what I need.  Has a good tight seal and hold iPod good from not moving around. Externl AUX works great to plug into an atv stereo and still protect your iPod at the same time.

Reviews.Title: BUEN PRODUCTO
Reviews.Author: Camilo Salgado
Reviews.Content: OLA TRABAJO EN AGUA Y EN ALTURAS Y ES UN PRODUCTO MUY BUENO PARA PODER TRANSPORTAR TU MUSICA O RECIBIR LLAMADAS

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: karthik
Reviews.Content: ProsCan drop in the water and not worry about damaging the phoneGood compact designSturdy, can take a hitConsExpensive

Reviews.Title: Great Concept but...........
Reviews.Author: G. Fuller
Reviews.Content: This Pelican/1015 case worked very well at keeping pool water off my IPhone during a South Pacific cruise. However, the case is lined in black and it absorbed all the sun rays making the inside of the box extremely hot which shut down my IPhone  in 20 minutes. I was thankful that Apple had built into the phone a safeguard that protected it in case of extreme heat.

Reviews.Title: perfect.
Reviews.Author: E. Madeline
Reviews.Content: this is exactly what i was looking for.  this case protects my iphone perfectly while kayaking.  i totally reccomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Solid, but has a cheap 'plastic' feel
Reviews.Author: Daniel Collins
Reviews.Content: I needed a few small cases to store various items - radios, batteries, and such. I found both these and the OtterBox cases. While Pelican is the gold standard for the larger cases, and while I'm definitely going to go with the Pelican cases for my medium or large case needs, I am not a fan of these micro cases.The pictures are a little misleading - the entire case is clear, the bottom has a fitted rubber shell in it, but the entire structural component is made of the clear plastic. It must be solid enough, which is why it does get four stars, but the feel of it just gives me the impression of a cheap tupperware bin or a child's toy rather than a professional rugged tool.The lines you can see on the picture do 'fit in' with lines on the bottom, so if you have two of the same size they will stack and will not slide side to side, though they will slide front to back. The carabiner attaches to a protrusion only about 1/4" wide, which seems like the first thing that would break off given any abuse, and the latching mechanism is easy to use but secure.

Reviews.Title: Awesome case
Reviews.Author: sr
Reviews.Content: This is the kind of case for mt biking through muddy wet terrain it tough and awesome not for a business lunch though

Reviews.Title: Case is great
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Love it. Love it.  Love it.  I can even take calls with it.  Wish I could make calls without opening it. But it is the best case I've ever used. Protects from drop and water.  Even store ear buds when not using.

Reviews.Title: With Mytouch 4G
Reviews.Author: Uncle Tony
Reviews.Content: I've been using this case for about a year with the MyTouch 4G and overall it's great. The stock headset controls the phone through the 3.5mm jack. It does have some quirks though. You must remove the phone from any case you have because the fit is very tight. Also he locking tab hits the headphone jack when it's parallel to the case so you really want to be sure it's latched. And finally it's HUGE. I gave it 4 stars because it's nearly indestructible. I've stood on it with my phone inside with no concern that it would collapse (yeah, seems pretty stupid now that I consider it :) It's dust proof, water resistant & likely waterproof but I've not submerged it for any real length of time. This case has been banged up a lot and the phone is still perfect. If you want peace of mind that your device is safe then ignore the quirks and get this case.

Reviews.Title: it does not fit the 4th generation but it is a sturdy case
Reviews.Author: austinjd1
Reviews.Content: it is a reliable case but i was upset when it did not fit my 4th generation ipod touch but overall it is a nice case

Reviews.Title: Pelican i1015 Case for iPhone and iPod.
Reviews.Author: A. Slaski "BoomBoom4216"
Reviews.Content: Again another great piece of kit from Pelican...One thing is that it says that it has a pressure equalising vent - which it doesn't! Let down!!!Second of all, the rubber inner liner which acts as the iPhone / iPod cradle is also the outer gasket that keeps the Pelican case water resistant... Not a good idea, as I wanted to modify the inner rubber area, and if you do that the seal is buggered!The case is as per usual well made and in the USA, however attaching straps via the loops top and bottom is problematic, and the carabiner loop is useless too all ends. I plan to try to make a decent strap to carry this on my back via a sash loop, as its bulky and quiet heavy to carry by hand.You cant change songs with the box locked (iPod), so you need to open and close it, or keep the iPod running and shake to shuffle to change songs - which wastes battery time.I am unsure whether this I1015 is able to be used with apples hands free ear piece, that allows you to take calls and so forth - it doesnt say it anywhere that I've read...

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: stakon
Reviews.Content: Very good product. Kept my Iphone safe from mud, snow, humidity and crashes while skiing. You can't use it. I had it in my bag

Reviews.Title: Best protection
Reviews.Author: Lex
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best protection you can get for your iphone. I use mine when I want to toss the phone in a backpack and take it out on the atv trails  I will probably trim the rubber insert a little as I want it to fit my phone with a cover.  Overall, great stuff you would expect from pelican.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fit. Well made.
Reviews.Author: EYE4GET
Reviews.Content: I am exceptionally pleased with the i1015 case.  I have the Otter Box Commuter case on my iPhone 4 and it still fits (tightly) nicely.  The foam pads inside the clear cover prevent movement and there is space for the USB charging cord and ear phones underneath.  The exterior audio connector is also handy!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: dp "Dave"
Reviews.Content: The quality and function of this product has completely exceeded my expectations.  We purchased two of these in preparation for a trip to a remote Caribbean island where we knew we would be exposed to sand, mud, water and a lot of vibration.  The cases did a magnificent job of protecting the delicate iPhones. At the end of the trip, after being exposed to a fairly harsh environment, the phones looked as good as they did before we started the trip.  This is an exceptional product and well worth the price because of the quality and piece of mind it provides.

Reviews.Title: Perfect in almost every way
Reviews.Author: Duramax
Reviews.Content: Case is pretty well sized although could maybe be just a little thinner. The internal headphone jack is a little awkward to plug into a phone and fit inside the case but works just fine nonetheless. The case itself works perfectly and external jack is awesome as well as turns which is nifty. Occasionally when trying to close my case, the headphone jack liked to get caught in the latch, but I suspect that's more user error.

Reviews.Title: Extremely satsified
Reviews.Author: mom with little kids
Reviews.Content: I bought two of the CLEAR cover cases for my husband and myself and we love them! We have a 3 year old that wathces movies on our Ipod touch and cringe everytime he picks it up. With this set up he can watch the movie without damaging the screen. We also travel to the beach a lot so it keeps the sand away from the devices you store. He sometimes puts his Blackberry in it. You can hook either head phones up to the jack OR I have a mini iPod speaker that we use to listen to music or movies. The only con is that it is rather bulky, BUT I knew that before I purchased and was just looking for a strong protective case for traveling. I feel confident that if I throw it in my bag its not going to damage my iPod. Hope this helps :)

Reviews.Title: Solid and earbud/ mic jack works well with iphone4
Reviews.Author: Beachbum
Reviews.Content: I feel that my phone is very secure in this case. I have not put it underwater at any depth but I imagine the key is to make sure that the seal is perfectly clean like with any o-ring on a waterproof housing.

Reviews.Title: They work
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Clarke "KC"
Reviews.Content: The pelican black case and the ear plugs work great.  The case protects my husband's iphone and the ear plugs stays in his ears (which he was surprised).

Reviews.Title: great product from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Charles Carter
Reviews.Content: I was able to buy this on Amazon for less then the price of an empty black 1010 Pelican case! Basically I was able to buy a $40 case for around $11.  I am stationed in Afghanistan and it does a great job of protecting my Creative Zen from the elements. It has a rubber cushion that cradles your MP3 player.

Reviews.Title: Ready to try it!
Reviews.Author: Ke'ala
Reviews.Content: Thank you! Ever since I've heard that you can take your ipod underwater with you with an ipod case, I've wanted a water protected one so bad- but apple sells them for close to a $100!! I wasn't spending that money, I really can't wait to try this out, the reviews look good, and I tested the sound and it seems fine, I just have to get waterproof headphones! This came in instantly!

Reviews.Title: bombproof phone case
Reviews.Author: MADJACK
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this case for a samsung vibrant, the case needs the little bumpers in the lining cut out to fit my phone, which is a little bigger than an Iphone, but it works once the interior is modified. Big for everyday use, it is none the less bomb proof for those field ops. I wish they'd make one for the vibrant specifically and a little thinner to boot. I would use it every day then.

Reviews.Title: i1015 review
Reviews.Author: JGS3
Reviews.Content: This product is just what my daughter needed. She has had issues with electronics and water exposure due to the fact that she is a sailor.

Reviews.Title: Pelican IPhone Case
Reviews.Author: James "Someone who cannot get enough "rea...
Reviews.Content: Fantastic!  I can now relax in the hot tub and not worry about the IPhone's worst enemy - water!!!!  It can rain, splash, steam, whatever!!!!

Reviews.Title: Its a great big box lol.
Reviews.Author: Gregory M. Cross
Reviews.Content: The only flaw is myself. I thought you could touch the screen from the outside but you cant. its in about 1/2 inch away from the plastic. but it looks like its a good case if u have to give it a beating in the rain lol.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Angel Mazzie "Darknezzzz"
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered this for work, I work in a factory and did not want to bump into something and smash my phone's screen (samsung moment). It fits the Samsung Moment, but have to watch the talk and end buttons, make sure to slide the phone up to the top of the case or the foam inside will press down on them making your phone stay lit and draining your battery. The case is like a tank, and as big as one...lol, for real it protects great but is bulky. It cannot fit in your pocket good, I kept mine in my jacket pocket, people would laugh and say it looked like I was carrying around a display case, but hey my phone didn't get broke! I tried to use the clip on my jeans but it's so big and it bounces around when you walk!!! So if your looking to protect your phone this is the way to go, but if you just want a hard case to carry your phone this might not be what your looking for!

Reviews.Title: DOESN'T WORK FOR IPHONE 5
Reviews.Author: Nathanial A Johns
Reviews.Content: Sure the iphone technically fits inside the box.  Unless you want to use the headphone jack.  THEN IT DOESN'T FIT.  What a bunch of crap. Its just an expensive piece of Tupperware without the headphone jack.Other than that the case is great.

Reviews.Title: Too small for the iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: onbelay58 "onbelay58"
Reviews.Content: This product is well made and would be all I'd hoped for if it was sized slightly larger. Unfortunately, the newest member of the iPhone family is too tall to fit if you leave it in its' daily non-protective case or if you intend to use the audio jack. It is worthwhile if your phone fits, and I will buy a new one if they make a resized version for the larger iPhone. If you have an older iPhone, then by all means buy it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!!
Reviews.Author: Fredinater
Reviews.Content: I love this gadget, I was running away from a serial killer, and I fell, but my iPod was still safe, but the serial killer caught up to me and knocked me unconscious, but I am happy to say that my iPod is still okay, and the only thing the serial killer took from me was my left arm:) So, I am now going to go scuba diving, and listen to my iPod!!! Love the case!!!NEWS: Man with missing left arm, pre-mortom, was found on a beach with his torso cut in two, blamed on shark attack. Beware of sharks while on the beaches. Order of Amity P.D.

Reviews.Title: strong box
Reviews.Author: Bill Welte "stickeen"
Reviews.Content: This little baby allowed me to plug in my headphones and drop it in the bottom of my kayak without worry. Sloshing around in water all day didn't affect it one bit. I also put my solar charger in one and was able to charge it during the day by placing it on top of my kayak. Great little box!

Reviews.Title: Great case, jack no so much.
Reviews.Author: J. Deverse
Reviews.Content: I am a Soldier currently deployed to Afghanistan. I bought this to protect my Microsoft Zune. The concept is great; it fits my Zune perfectly and keeps it safe from harm. Within the first month the internal headphone jack part stopped working. I pulled it out leaving a hole in the side of the case. I still use it; I just have to run my headphone cord through the hole. It only works with a bent jack though. A straight jack is too long and the case won't close. Other than the jack going bad I really recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice protection, solid case
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: It is a good case and offers great protection.  The av jack for headphones is a nice feature.  Only complaint is that the ringer and volume control buttons get pushed by the rubber liner inside.  Thus, the riger gets turned down to zero if you aren't careful.

Reviews.Title: Great protection, details need a little tweaking.
Reviews.Author: W. Salzmann "Firefighter"
Reviews.Content: I have 7 or 8 Pelican Micro cases already and love them.  This case for my ipod touch is a nice addition, but it needs a little tweaking in the details.  First, the storage for the earphones is awkward.  Having to remove the ipod from the case to get at the earphones (they coil up beneath the unit around a central rubber "core") is not only awkward but also somewhat defeats the purpose of having it in a protective case.  It also doesn't hold onto the ipod well.  When closed, the ipod is held quite firmly, but when opened, the little rubber "fingers" do not grip it tightly enough to prevent it from falling out if tipped upside down.  The cord which plugs into the earphone jack to allow you to plug in your ear buds from the outside does in fact allow the use of the microphone on your earbuds so that is a nice feature.  All in all, a nice protective case, but I have to carry my earbuds externally to avoid the juggling act required to carry them "in case".  One more thing, be sure to apply one of those clear protective films to the outside of the "viewing panel" molded into the case or it will quickly become hazed with scratches.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised !!!
Reviews.Author: Padraven
Reviews.Content: Supposed to be a clear case as pictured and described...as others have stated...it arrives in black.

Reviews.Title: Pelican i1015 hard case
Reviews.Author: J. Metcalf "Ned"
Reviews.Content: Good case for extreme protection. Not for day in day out use, catered more towards travel and adventure protection. Perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: Pelican i1015 Case
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: This case is built very nicely, it is sturdy so I'm not to afraid of dropping it. I bought this case for my Zune 120GB, it will fit the Zune perfectly but I had to take off my Zune rubber case which is fine as long as its in the pelican nothing will happen to it.

Reviews.Title: Pelican looks like it is what I want.
Reviews.Author: J. Dellis "JoyD"
Reviews.Content: Well made and what I needed for Pelican is a great product. Haven't had time to test it yet in the water, but I think it will do the job.

Reviews.Title: Good case if a bit bulky
Reviews.Author: LCK
Reviews.Content: The case works fine and protects the phone from both water and impact.  The sound is good from the ear buds.  It is a bit bulky and a pain if you need to open it up to answer a call or access the phone.

Reviews.Title: Pelican i1015
Reviews.Author: Travis Piper
Reviews.Content: This product works great for what it's intended for, I do wish it was fully water proof but it is good enough for an accidental drop into water, I found it leaked around the headphone connector. I have a Zune hd that's being used with it with a rubber sleeve to keep it secure.

Reviews.Title: The case to end all
Reviews.Author: Brian P. Stokes
Reviews.Content: in the case if sheer protection that is. Yes this case is big and bulky, no you cannot use anything but the headphones when your phone is in the case, but that's not the point. This case is purely for protection of your beloved device. It looks and feels like it could withstand much more abuse than the average person could dish out, and that's really what it is for. Throw your phone in this thing if your going kayaking, mountain climbing, or on the beach. Its not for everyday use, but at the price its worth having one. I know it's only watertight but on the good faith of a product made in the USA I threw my phone in a container of dishwater and left it submerged for about 5 minutes, this is by no means any guarantee but it came out totally dry, so I'm sure its watertight as they say. The only downside to this thing is that the liner has to be in it for the watertight ability, and it takes up about half the case with storage for headphones and a cushion for your phone. this case also works with the mic and volume control on a set of iPhone headphones. Pelican is a great American company and this is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Arrived cracked
Reviews.Author: Jason Greenwald "BA in Television"
Reviews.Content: Item arrived cracked at the hinge so I sent it back and went on using my otterbox. I have a pelican backpack no problem with that this seemed to have just been a bad seller.

Reviews.Title: So So product
Reviews.Author: David E. Martin "Wee Doggie"
Reviews.Content: This works great in the pool..I read a review saying that some guy scuba dived down to 50 ft with no leaks and 90 feet with a few drops. I dove 50 feet and when i came back up there was about 2 tablespoons of water inside. also you can not access the Iphone through the case as advertised..that really sucks false and misleading. Its ok for the swimming pool if you like to listen to music playlist that you cant change while using

Reviews.Title: Great case but wrong one also...I ordered clear they shipped black
Reviews.Author: pike513
Reviews.Content: Love the quality of the case and Pelican is the only guy I have found that makes a hard case for travel

Reviews.Title: Pelican phone case
Reviews.Author: Antagonizer
Reviews.Content: Phone case was for an iPhone 4 not iPhone 5. The description did not specify this when I purchased the phone case.

Reviews.Title: Great Case but got the wrong one.
Reviews.Author: Donald Hopkins "Donald Hopkins"
Reviews.Content: This is a great case but I ordered the clear case and got the black one.  I like it but I'm disappointed in what I received. The seller needs to insure we receive what they are advertising. The picture shows a clear case and not the black case.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't matter if the product title says clear, you get a jet black case
Reviews.Author: C. Ash "naclh2o"
Reviews.Content: the case if fabulous. but not as advertised.  it is cited as clear. this is the 2nd time I've tried to order this case, both times it comes jet black, not clear. I do not want a jet black case.if you can live with black and the supplier ignoring your order, go for it. very disappointed & back it goes again.

Reviews.Title: Cant control my phone
Reviews.Author: Angel G.
Reviews.Content: I lost two phone using this device.  This is not a convenient carrying case is to bulky and definitely not practical.

Reviews.Title: NOT WATERTIGHT AT ALL
Reviews.Author: Michael McCloskey
Reviews.Content: It was Black - not clear.It is splashproof - NOT WATERTIGHT at allPelican shpould be embarrassed to have their reputation behind this

Reviews.Title: Do not buy if you use an OtterBox!
Reviews.Author: Deputy5211 "Critical Thinker"
Reviews.Content: First of all, this item is listed by Amazon as black case with clear lid, IT IS NOT.  It is a clear case with a clear lid.  The removable rubber insert is black, but the case remains clear.  This is important to note as in my implementation, I cannot use the removable insert.Iphone 4/4S in OtterBox Defender will not fit in this Pelican i1015 box.  The insert is too big to allow the device to fit.  If one removes the rubber insert, the device fits well, but since the rubber insert also functions as the sealing gasket, the box does not seal without it.I telephoned Pelican, explained the problem, and asked them to send me a plain gasket, perhaps from the 1015 (non "i" version).  The rep stated there is no such product (even though it prominently shows on their web site).  After a small delay, she stated she will send me a replacement insert which I could cut down so only the sealing gasket is used.  I will try this solution and if ineffective, I suspect that I will return the i1015.At least they did not suggest that I remove the OtterBox Defender when I wanted to use the Pelican box!  What a P.I.T.A. that would be!

Reviews.Title: Not very useful at all for iPhone4.
Reviews.Author: Christopher J Hughey
Reviews.Content: I got this in hopes of finding a way to take my iPhone4 on runs and hikes to use the phone's MP3 and GPS functionalities on such activities. But the case is too tight and it makes songs skip. I guess it is OK if you just want something to protect the iPhone while doing activities, but don't expect to be able to use the device at all.

Reviews.Title: WAY TOO BULKY
Reviews.Author: The Truth07
Reviews.Content: I can't say I used this.  When I finally got it in the mail and took a look at it.  I realized it is way too big.  Running with this would be liking running with weights.  The only good quality would be that it's waterproof.  But it's so bulky, so big, and doesn't come with a strap that even if it is waterproof you wouldn't go swimming with it because you'd lose it at the bottom of the pool or ocean.  So I sent it back and bought a Otter Box.

Reviews.Title: I originally gave Overboard a high rating because it worked but two months after I purchased it it leaked. It was used only a fe
Reviews.Author: ejones
Reviews.Content: I originally gave Overboard a high rating because it worked but two months after I purchased it it leaked. It was used only a few times while swimming in a YMCA pool. It wasn't abused or stressed in anyway but it still leaked and ruined the Ipod. I contacted the company because I felt it still must be under warranty. I discovered the company is located in the UK. They stated to mail the item to them; they would send it out to an independent lab and have it tested to see if the product was at fault.I wasn't going to waste the time because I got the impression the company was going to admit fault but I thought I'd provide my point and I sent it anyway. I mailed the item to the address provided and also put it to the attention of the person I had been emailing, 5 days later they received the package. Since I never heard from them I contacted the same person a few weeks after they received the package. He stated he never received it. Well that convenient especially since the company received the package 5 days after I mailed and I put it to the attention of a specific person, which I had been emailing.All of their products are made from a thin flexible plastic. I actually purchased this for my mother to use while at the pool. I've used a H2O product for over 3 years and never had a problem. After this incident I purchased another H2O product for my mother. It works great and the company is located in San Diego, CA.Here's two other reviews I located on other web sites:"Case splits and does not work. Overboard accept no responsibility for this. best avoided"Another review from another web site,"please, take my advice.... DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.it falls apart when you open it.and then it doesn't float.then your ipod will get water damage.and the company will deny your claim that it's defective.repeat: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.in fact, run far away from it.you'll thank me later"

Reviews.Title: Warning - No Access to ANY Controls
Reviews.Author: Andy M
Reviews.Content: Heads up that this case provides no access to any device controls: the touch screen, the main ("home") button, the sleep button, and the volume buttons are all NOT accessible when device is in the case.  So if you want to do ANYTHING more than listen to music with the integrated headphones button, don't buy this case.  I sure wish the product description had disclosed this fairly crucial fact.

Reviews.Title: Not up to Pelican's standards.
Reviews.Author: Lightsmith
Reviews.Content: Pelican cases are known for their bomb-proof and waterproof durability.  I carry high-dollar camera gear in my kayak, and only use Pelican cases.  But when I wanted a similar product for my iPhone 4 I found this stupid case with headphone jacks sticking out the side.  Come on Pelican -- I go to the wilderness to escape the fast-food rap-music instant-gratification crap that we live with every day.  I certainly do not want to do it while listening to my iPhone.  What's the point?  Pelican has assumed, wrongly, that we all want to operate our electronic devices in these situations, when all some of us want to do is have them available in case of an emergency.  And we don't want superfluous crap attached to create just one more potential failure point.  Not what I expect from a normally serious gear company like Pelican.
